Breadth-First.Explanation: General overview and divergent clue collection without a specific hypothesis

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent hypothesis generation and verification by comparing specific architectural features
Depth-First.KeyElement: Hypothesis that the image is the Alhambra based on Nasrid style

Depth-First.Explanation: Specific identification of the location based on the confirmed hypothesis
Depth-First.KeyElement: Court of the Myrtles at the Alhambra

Depth-First.Explanation: Verification of the identification through key architectural details
Depth-First.KeyElement: Reflecting pool, horseshoe arches, Comares Tower

Depth-First.Explanation: Detailed location specification and plan to further confirm the hypothesis

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Attention shifts from broad description to a specific hypothesis (Alhambra) and targeted verification
